ygData.subject: Re: Thinking about adventuring to Guk tonight- advice needed
ygData.msgSnippet: ... and/or Mesh armor. ... Is it possible to make it to Guk alive for a High Elf? I am interested in getting some better armour myself, but do not desire to
ygData.messageBody:
>> I decided on Guk to try to score some Netted, Woven
and/or Mesh armor.

> If you go into Guk stay to the first three rooms.

Is it possible to make it to Guk alive for a High Elf?
I am interested in getting some better armour myself,
but do not desire to die at the hands of guards. Any
advice would be appreciated.

Arcius
High Elven Wizard
10th level
